Deleting Links

When a link to a folder or item is incorrect or has become obsolete, you can easily delete it.

To delete a link for a folder or item:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy or an item from the upper pane.

  2. Do one of the following:

    • For a folder, select Folder > Properties to display the Folder Properties dialog. Then click the Link tab.

    • For an item, select the Link tab from the lower pane.

      • These actions display all links to the folder or item.

  3. On the Link tab or pane, right-click the link to be deleted.

  4. Select Delete Link from the context menu.

  5. Click OK.
